incoming.page_description.text: Share sensitive information securely with our support team

incoming.feature_disabled_description.text: This feature is currently disabled. Please contact support for assistance.

incoming.memo_hint.text: Help us route your message to the right person

incoming.recipient_aria_label.text: Select a recipient for this secret

incoming.recipient_hint.text: Choose who will receive this secure message

incoming.secret_content_placeholder.text: Paste sensitive information here (passwords, keys, etc.)

incoming.secret_content_hint.text: This information will be encrypted and only viewable once

incoming.success_description.text: Your secure message has been delivered.

incoming.success_info_description.text: The recipient will be able to view this secret only once. After they view it, the secret will be permanently deleted.

incoming.tagline2.text: Keep passwords and private data out of email and chat logs
